mapper.insert: insert into member(user_id, user_name, user_email,user_pw, salt, user_verify, partner_verify) values('M'||member_seq.nextval, #{user_name}, #{user_email}, #{user_pw}, #{salt}, #{user_verify}, #{partner_verify})
mapper.select: select salt from member where user_email = #{user_email}
select * from member where user_email = #{user_email} and user_pw = #{user_pw}
mapper.update: update member set user_verify = 1 where user_email = #{user_email}
update member set user_pw = #{user_pw} where user_email = #{user_email}
